Title: VIR-268.01 Verify that the customer can select the quantity of items before adding to the cart on the product details page
VIR-268.02 Verify that the customer can add quantity by dropdown
VIR-268.03 Verify that the customer can add the quantity manually
VIR-268.04 Verify that the quantity is automatically moved to 1 if customer enters 0
VIR-268.05 Verify that the customer is not able to add more items than 9,999 in one order
